title: 主格與受格代名詞練習
desc: 練習使用主格與受格代名詞，透過改錯句子與造句加強理解。
prompt_en: Correct the pronouns in the sentences or create new sentences using subject and object pronouns.
prompt_zh: 改正句子中的主格或受格代名詞，或造出使用主格與受格代名詞的新句子。
sample_questions: She gave the book to I.
Create a sentence using 'they' as the subject and 'us' as the object.

title: 所有格代名詞練習
desc: 練習使用所有格代名詞，辨識並造句加強所有權的表達。
prompt_en: Identify and use possessive pronouns correctly in sentences or create your own sentences using possessive pronouns.
prompt_zh: 辨識並正確使用所有格代名詞，或造出使用所有格代名詞的句子。
sample_questions: Whose pen is this? Is it ___ (your/yours)?
Make a sentence using 'hers' as a possessive pronoun.

title: 代名詞替換練習
desc: 練習將句子中的名詞替換成適當的代名詞，提升代名詞的靈活運用能力。
prompt_en: Replace the nouns in the sentences with the correct pronouns.
prompt_zh: 將句子中的名詞替換成正確的代名詞。
sample_questions: Tom and Jerry are friends. ___ like to play soccer.
I saw Mary yesterday. ___ was very happy.
The dog is barking. ___ wants to go outside.

title: 代名詞錯誤改正
desc: 找出句子中代名詞使用錯誤並加以改正，強化代名詞的正確用法。
prompt_en: Find and correct the pronoun errors in the sentences.
prompt_zh: 找出句子中代名詞的錯誤並改正。
sample_questions: Her and me went to the market.
Is this book your or yours?

title: 代名詞情境對話練習
desc: 透過模擬對話練習代名詞的使用，提升實際溝通能力。
prompt_en: Practice using pronouns in a conversation. Respond to questions or prompts using the correct pronouns.
prompt_zh: 透過模擬對話練習代名詞的使用，根據問題或提示回答並使用正確的代名詞。
sample_questions: Q: Who is coming to the party? A: ___ (They/Them) are coming.
Q: Is this your book? A: No, it is not ___.
Q: Tell me about your family using pronouns.
